snippet.title: Mikey Hooks - Android Trailer
snippet.description:
COMING TO GOOGLE PLAY APRIL 10TH 2014!

RUN, JUMP, SLIDE, and HOOK!
Collect coins and find hidden Golden Shorts, but watch out for enemies!

-6 unique environments with 36 levels
-Over 220 fun disguises to wear
-4 Exclusive Google Play disguises! 
-Compete on Google Play Game Services Leaderboards
-Earn achievements
-Race against ghosts
-View your game statistics
-Ability to customize controls
-Looks Great on Tablets

Follow us on Twitter: @beavertapgames
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/beavertapgames

Ported and Published by Noodlecake Games
Follow us on Twitter: @noodlecakegames
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/noodlecakestudios
